/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, painted in shades of red and brown, add a warm hue to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. The image is taken on a sunny day, with the sun casting shadows on the ground, adding depth and dimension to the scene.
